roleset.name: make denser or more compact

roles.note: Watch out for non eventive instances refering to water droplets.

example.name: transitive, all args
example.text: John condensed the trash with a hammer.

roleset.note: Framed by Neville based on BROWN; nominal 'condensation' based on BOLT-7. VN entry in other_cos-45.4.

example.name: nominal rel: condensation
example.text: Condensation of thought legacy is to solve a consensus and the understanding of the concept of problems .

example.name: NOT EVENTIVE: condensation that = water droplets. .YY!!
example.text: I use the condensation on the outside of my drink to clean my hands :D.
